description.main: Nanoimprint lithography is a technique that enables the replication of sub-micrometric fine features at wafer level and can be ideally applies onto any substrates. It is viewed as an alternative production solution compared with E-beam and EUV lithography
description.suitable_for: Particularly, NIL is suitable for the following product demands:

requirements.structure: Hybrid or complex structure - 2D/3D irregular distribute shape
requirements.scale: Medium-to-small economic or highly customized production scale
